mapper.sql: visitor_id, visitor_ip, visitory_url, visitor_country, visitor_province, visitor_city, visitor_area, visitory_time, visitor_count
mapper.select: select visitor_province name , SUM(visitor_count) value from t_visitor GROUP BY visitor_province
mapper.insert:

mapper.update:
update t_visitor
visitor_ip = #{visitorIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
visitory_url = #{visitoryUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
visitor_country = #{visitorCountry,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
visitor_province = #{visitorProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
visitor_city = #{visitorCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
visitor_area = #{visitorArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
visitory_time = #{visitoryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
visitor_count = #{visitorCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where visitor_id = #{visitorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_visitor set visitor_ip = #{visitorIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, visitory_url = #{visitoryUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, visitor_country = #{visitorCountry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, visitor_province = #{visitorProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, visitor_city = #{visitorCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, visitor_area = #{visitorArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, visitory_time = #{visitoryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, visitor_count = #{visitorCount,jdbcType=INTEGER} where visitor_id = #{visitorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
